name: Shoy
overview:
Shoy enables businesses to reward people with great discounts if they spread the good word about them to their friends.

Web-ads, magazine/newspaper ads, daily deals etc. are nowadays hardly absorbed by consumers. A lot of research shows that these consumers have instead started listening to their friends to find out what’s nice and to make purchasing decisions. With social media friends of friends of friends are also listening.

Shoy.com allows companies to easily create and customize a 2 week discount campaign on their service or product. We then make it a 1 click process for these businesses to share their campaign with their current friends. We do the same with our friends.

If people want to obtain these great discounts they need to promote it to the friends that they think will like it too. This is a 1 click process, the shoy it button. A coupon is unlocked for both of them if a friend checks out the businesses’ campaign page. (Max 1 per person)

This way businesses can almost automatically create a big viral marketing campaign for themselves. We charge per coupon unlocked and businesses set their own maximum number of available coupons for a campaign.

video_embeds.description: Viral Marketing made fun, easy and cheap.
